mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(SEQ) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE MAX(SEQ) + 1 END as SEQ FROM IMB_COMMENT WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND ARTICLE_SEQ = #{articleSeq}

SELECT A.BOARD_ID, A.ARTICLE_SEQ, A.SEQ, A.CONTENT,
( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(A.REGISTER_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') THEN DATE_FORMAT(A.REGISTER_DATE, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(A.REGISTER_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') END ) AS REGISTER_DATE,
DATE_FORMAT(A.REGISTER_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REGISTER_DATE,
A.GOOD, A.BAD, A.WRITER_ID, CASE WHEN B.NAME IS NULL THEN A.WRITER_NAME ELSE B.NAME END AS WRITER_NAME, B.DISPLAY_ID AS WRITER_DISPLAY_ID, A.PARENT_WRITER_ID, C.ID AS PARENT_WRITER_ID, CASE WHEN C.NAME IS NULL THEN A.PARENT_WRITER_NAME ELSE C.NAME END AS PARENT_WRITER_NAME, C.DISPLAY_ID AS PARENT_WRITER_DISPLAY_ID, B.PROFILE_IMG_URL AS WRITER_PROFILE_IMG_URL, A.PARENT_SEQ, A.GROUP_ID, A.STATUS FROM IMB_COMMENT AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN IMB_USER B ON A.WRITER_ID = B.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN IMB_USER C ON A.PARENT_WRITER_ID = C.ID WHERE A.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND A.ARTICLE_SEQ = #{articleSeq} AND A.SEQ = #{seq} ORDER BY A.GROUP_ID, A.SEQ
